name: Little Food Adventure
description:
Game created by Team Little Hut. Contributors are:

- stellarlights (coder)
- Priyanshu (sprite artist)
- Adrian (music)
- Thighs (sprite artist)

also some free assets from this website. :)

Instructions:

1. To exit game pres 'ESC'
2. Use WASD to navigate
3. Press the space bar to interact with a tree
4. Press enter to open the menu.
